markdownRemark.html:
Check Date

Works on 2019-01-25 23:51:47+0800

Question

How to select columns of text in VS Code on macOS ?

Answer

VS Code version 1.27

On macOS: Shift+Option and mouse, or Shift+Option+Cmd and arrow keys

Reference

  • https://superuser.com/questions/1052795/selecting-columns-in-vs-code

frontmatter.title: How to Select Columns Of Text In VS Code on macOS
